RelatedSentence: While our figures generally tracked those of our friends at the Wesleyan Media Project ,  who used data from Kantar Media / CMAG to estimate how much had been spent in total on broadcast and national cable buys in the Senate race , the Bevin buys were a glaring exception that appears to prove the value of pulling contracts and entering data .
By our calculation , Bevin 's campaign committee spent just shy of $ 650,000 on ads , nearly twice the Kantar / CMAG figure for the entire state .
Sarah Durand , the campaign 's spokeswoman , told Sunlight in an e-mail that this figure is closer to their actual spending .
This figure dwarfs McConnell 's $ 105,000 and Lundergan Grimes ' just under $ 82,000 spent - as these campaigns appear to be relying more on outside groups in the Louisville market .
